problem_text_cn: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,B、C是切点,若∠A=70°,则∠BOC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are the two tangents of ⊙O, and B and C are the tangent points. If ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB、AC是⊙O的两条切线,B、C是切点,∴∠B=∠C=90°,∠BOC=180°-∠A=110°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题利用了切线的性质,四边形的内角和为360度求解．
